title: Nations with 85% of Earth's forests pledge to reverse deforestation
content:
1. Nations with 85% of Earth's forests pledge to reverse deforestation  NPR
  2. COP26: World leaders promise to end deforestation by 2030  BBC News
  3. Start your day here: World leaders pledge to end deforestation; it's a big Election Day in Va., N.J and N.Y.; Pfizer shots for kids are around the corner  NPR
  4. What is deforestation – and is stopping it really possible?  The Guardian
  5. Tackling deforestation must be at the heart of our response to the climate crisis  The Guardian
